thegame.screens

Class GameScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • thegame.screens.GameScreen

  • public class GameScreen
extends java.lang.Object
    The main game screen where the user plays the puzzle game. Manages game state, grid rendering, and gameplay mechanics.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameScreen(App app, LevelConfig levelConfig)
      Constructs a new game screen with the specified level configuration.
      GameScreen(App app, LevelConfig levelConfig, boolean verificationMode)
      Creates a game screen in verification mode for testing level solvability.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Cleans up resources used by the game screen.
      static GameScreen fromLevelNumber(App app, int levelNumber)
      Creates a GameScreen from a built-in level number.
      LevelConfig getLevelConfig()
      Gets the level configuration for this game screen.
      void handleCharInput(int codepoint)
      Handles character input events.
      void handleKeyPress(int key, int action)
      Handles key press events.
      void handleMouseClick(double mouseX, double mouseY)
      Handles mouse click events, including UI button clicks and grid cell selection.
      void handleMouseMove(double mouseX, double mouseY)
      Updates the current mouse position.
      void handleMouseRelease(double mouseX, double mouseY)
      Handles mouse release events, completing drag operations.
      void render()
      Renders the game screen, including grids, buttons, and UI elements.

        Constructs a new game screen with the specified level configuration.

        app - The main application instance
        levelConfig - The configuration for the level to be played
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if levelConfig is invalid

      • GameScreen

        public GameScreen(App app,
                  LevelConfig levelConfig,
                  boolean verificationMode)
        Creates a game screen in verification mode for testing level solvability.
        Parameters:
        app - The main application instance
        levelConfig - The level configuration to verify
        verificationMode - Whether to run in verification mode
